member.summary: Gets the unique ID of the task.
member.value: A value containing the unique identifier of the task.

member.summary: Gets the time when task was created, expressed as UTC.
member.value: A value containing the creation time of the task, expressed as UTC.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Processing.Tasks.Abstractions.IProcessingTaskData.Updated
member.summary: Gets time when the record was last accessed by a worker, expressed as UTC. An access from the worker typically means an update in the task status or progress.
member.value: A value containing time when the record was last accessed by a worker, expressed as UTC.

member.summary: Gets the token used to identify this particular version of the task data.

member.summary: Gets the absolute expiration time for the task, expressed as UTC.
member.value: A value of absolute expiration.

member.summary: Gets the type of the task: deferred action or distributed task.
member.value: A value describing the type of the task.

member.value: The status of the task. See for possible values.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Processing.Tasks.Abstractions.IProcessingTaskData.Progress
member.summary: Gets the progress of the task.
member.value: The number of items processed by the task so far, if property has value , or the total number of processed items, if property has value .

member.name: P:Sitecore.Processing.Tasks.Abstractions.IProcessingTaskData.Total
member.summary: Gets the total approximate number of items to process.
member.value: The total approximate number of items to process, if property has value . Otherwise, returns null.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Processing.Tasks.Abstractions.IProcessingTaskData.Description
member.summary: Gets the human-readable description of the task for use in administrative UI. The maximum length is symbols.
member.value: A containing the description of the task, or null if no description was specified when creating the task.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Processing.Tasks.Abstractions.IProcessingTaskData.Options
member.summary: Gets the runtime options associated with current task.
member.value: A value containing the options passed to the task implementation at runtime.

member.summary: Gets the list of Task IDs which are prerequisites for this task.

member.name: T:Sitecore.Processing.Tasks.Abstractions.ProcessingTaskStatus
member.summary: Defines possible statuses an may have while being processed.

member.name: F:Sitecore.Processing.Tasks.Abstractions.ProcessingTaskStatus.Pending
member.summary: The processing task has been created and is ready to be picked up by any of the workers.

member.name: F:Sitecore.Processing.Tasks.Abstractions.ProcessingTaskStatus.Processing
member.summary: The processing task has been picked up by one or multiple workers and is in progress.

member.name: F:Sitecore.Processing.Tasks.Abstractions.ProcessingTaskStatus.Completed
member.summary: The processing task has been completed successfully.

member.name: F:Sitecore.Processing.Tasks.Abstractions.ProcessingTaskStatus.Failed
member.summary: An error occurred during processing.

member.name: F:Sitecore.Processing.Tasks.Abstractions.ProcessingTaskStatus.Expired
member.summary: The processing task could not be completed within the allocated time frame.

member.name: F:Sitecore.Processing.Tasks.Abstractions.ProcessingTaskStatus.Canceled
member.summary: The processing task has been canceled.

member.name: T:Sitecore.Processing.Tasks.Abstractions.ProcessingTaskType
member.summary: Defines all the types of , Processing Engine supports.

member.name: F:Sitecore.Processing.Tasks.Abstractions.ProcessingTaskType.DeferredAction
member.summary: A single-shot deferred action - execute code on the computing cluster instead of local machine.

member.name: F:Sitecore.Processing.Tasks.Abstractions.ProcessingTaskType.DistributedProcessing
member.summary: A distributed processing task for a range of database entities.
